article.title: A Study of Six University-Based Information Systems
article.author: Marron, BFong, E.Fife, D. W. Rankin, K.
article.text: A methodology for categorically describing computer-based information systems was developed and applied to six university-based, NSF-supported systems.. The systems under study all operate as retail information centers primarily serving campus communities by accessing large commercially-available data bases using 3rd generation computer configurations.. The systems vary in design philosophy, mode of user service, transferability characteristics, and operational status.. A summary matrix is included..
